description: Adherence to code rules, precise and descriptive variable names, comments explaining what particular code functions and methods do, and a README that documents what the whole code does and its dependencies.
In addition, code should be split into short units and portable so that it can be used on different systems.
Unit tests should be conducted regularly to ensure the code works as intended.
Finally, using linting tools like SonarQube and ESLint can help identify potential errors in the code.
